caseTitle: Kashif Aftab Ahmed Abbasi v. Federation of Pakistan thr. Secretary, Establishment Division, Islamabad
tagline: (1) Discussion on Rule 7 of the Occupational Groups and Services (Probation, Training and Seniority) Rules, 1990 and Rule 5 and 11 of Police Service of Pakistan (Composition, Cadre & Seniority) Rules, 1985. (2) In the jurisprudence of service laws, no one has a vested right to a particular promotion or particular seniority. No antedated seniority can be claimed as a vested right.
